Reviews.Title: Toshiba satellite
Reviews.Author: Taidi
Reviews.Content: It's okay but does not have a webcam and this to me is not cool as a mention was made about it in the technical details.

Reviews.Title: Great performance, regular look.
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: The Laptop works great but it have a quite cheap look when opened. Performance beats looks in my case so its fine as long as gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad, Touch Pad Is Annoying, Speakers Are AWFUL
Reviews.Author: Karen E. Rice
Reviews.Content: For the most part, I am satisfied with the laptop.  Had to get used to the keyboard, which is different than most other laptops I've used (has the number pad on the right, like a regular PC keyboard).  The touch pad is annoying in that the way it is placed, I end up bumping it unintentionally all the time, but that's minor.The main grievance I have with this laptop is the terrible quality of the speakers.  I need headphones to actually be able to HEAR - with headphones it is acceptable. Without headphones, the volume is very very muted.

Reviews.Title: tricked
Reviews.Author: candytt
Reviews.Content: The pictures used for this laptop are soooo misleading. If I knew that there was no webcam, I would not have bothered to purchase this. If the description of the laptop included a picture with a webcam, I expect to get one..

Reviews.Title: Price was good. Performance is not.
Reviews.Author: Free Advice
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop during a Black Friday sale last year.  I've been disappointed to say the least.  It is so sluggish on even mundane tasks. For example, the scroll bar on internet browsers, word processors, spreadsheets, etc. lags constantly, so you sit there looking at a frozen screen, until it decides to let you scroll on down the page (It's doing it as I work on this review). Sometimes, you can be typing away, and nothing goes into the text box, or you'll see a few characters, and then it skips the next few, like you never even pressed the keys for the letters in between. Also streaming videos, even after they have buffered, freeze up and jitter, and the audio sometimes has a delayed echo that's the same volume as the original audio.  Think of singing "Row, Row, Row Your Boat" with two people starting at different times. It's very annoying. Even .AVI movies and Windows Media files freeze up and skip. I thought it might just need a little more memory, so I added 2 more gigabytes of RAM, but didn't see any performance increase at all. And lastly, the speakers are so quiet, they are pretty much useless.  You have to use headphones to hear pretty much anything from the computer if there is any background at all.  If I had it to do all over again, I'd have spent just a little more and got a laptop that doesn't make me want to take a sledge hammer to it.

Reviews.Title: as advertised
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my wife, so she could do her thing (e-mail, facebook, and such) and have her own computer. The reason i picked this model is it recieved a good report from Consumer Reports. What you get for the price is worth it and have had no problems so far. The best part of the deal was the shipping which came a few days before it was promised.

Reviews.Title: computer
Reviews.Author: Angie Trotter
Reviews.Content: nice, I really love my computer and I use it all the time.  Right no the  doesn't ork, but I still enjoy using it

Reviews.Title: My laptop hates me
Reviews.Author: jlt11301
Reviews.Content: My toshiba satellite laptop refuses to find any wireless connections, even though I am right next to the wireless router when I try to connect! Can anybody help me with my hateful laptop?

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite laptop computer
Reviews.Author: nazarch
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect computer for wifi and internet access. Large screen and durable case is a plus. I also use this for my ipod and ham radio applications.

Reviews.Title: OMG>>>>>>>
Reviews.Author: Brina
Reviews.Content: omg this is the best B4 chrismas present ever. i had looked at laptops in local stores and other web sites. and finally choose this one from here.. i had gotten a ACER netbook in june of 09 wen i finished high school, but wanted a bugger screen and a better performance quality.I over all LOVE this laptop very much

Reviews.Title: Good, but.....
Reviews.Author: misty
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend bought mine for me as a 'back to school' present fo college. It's good. Sometimes can be a bit slow. As in a general computer, it's good, but should not cost so much. As far as 'special', it is not. As far as worth $400, no way. I was blown away to see the price tag on this thing! I would not hae spent so much on it! To tell the truth, if you want a great computer-it's good, but even if you are spending a little bit more, I'd make sure you are getting some extra features for this kind of money.I am happy with it, in general. But if I were going to spend the money, I'd want something more than general. At least for that kind of money, offer a variety of colors-something!What has happened to quality customer service?

Reviews.Title: Warning! Toshiba warranty service is substandard.
Reviews.Author: Veet Vivarto
Reviews.Content: I had issues with my screen.I sent the laptop to for the warranty repair and got it back without problem fixed.The tech wrote that they don't repair dead pixels, though my problem was not a dead pixel. I talked to the "customer service" and the lady there called Lara was quite unhelpful and frankly sounded stupid.I had a MUCH better experience with Dell warranty. Stay away form Toshiba, at least I WILL.

Reviews.Title: false advertisement!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: mztrina
Reviews.Content: As described in the product description, this laptop is suppose to have a built in webcam. Upon opening i realized that it does not!!!!! i am highly upset about it because it is one of the important features i searched MONTHS for in a laptop.......smh now i have to go thru the process of returns, waiting for my refund and ordering a whole other laptop. I should have just went my first mind and got an HP

Reviews.Title: A PRIMERA VISTA PARECE UNA BUENA PORTATIL
Reviews.Author: Richard Zomacal
Reviews.Content: HE UTILIZADO LA PORTATIL POR UNA SEMANA Y EN GENERAL SE DESENVUELVE RAPIDO. SOPORTA MUY BIEN LOS EFECTOS AREO DEL WINDOWS 7. LAS TECLAS SON COMODAS, YA QUE SON MUY SUAVES Y NO PRODUCEN RUIDO. EL PUNTO NEGATIVO QUE LE HE ENCONTRADO SON LAS CORNETAS QUE A MI JUICIO SUENAN MUY BAJO.

Reviews.Title: Stay away from Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Knight
Reviews.Content: My Toshiba Satellite crashed 5 times within the first year, each time Toshiba states they replaced the hard drive. Spent hours on the phone each time it crashed. On hold and sent from department to department. Never loaded any additional software. Short battery life, keys often have to be hit hard to register the letter you want on the screen. Keys fall off. Now out of warranty I own a worthless nonworking computer. Dont buy Toshiba!
